summary:
Remade from scratch, tried to correct a few issues some of you pointed out.
Work in progress.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#6aa84f][b][font=Verdana][size=6]ICBINE 4 [/size][/font][/b]
[/color][color=#45818e][size=4][b]Preview 2
[youtube]ShC-kaljrm8[/youtube]

[/b][/size][/color]This time I tried to correct a few issues some of you pointed out in the previous version, I hope you like it!
This version of ICBINE technically can be used with any weather mod but [color=#00ffff]it will only look as in the video and screenshots with[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937]VIVID WEATHERS[/url], please notice that in the video and screenshots there is depth of field and ambient occlusion, those were added by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75954]SKYRIM RELOADED[/url], an incredible mod that adds effects with really minimal to none performance impact in weak systems (you should be checking it ASAP!).

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]tl;dr[/b][/size][/color]
To make ICBINE4 look as in the video and screenshots you need Skyrim Reloaded and Vivid Weathers. (and ELFX for interiors)
[b][color=#00ff00](if your pc is so weak that it cant even handle skyrim Reloaded, ICBINE4 WILL WORK ANYWAYS)
[/color][/b]
If you want to see the performance impact you can try the cinematic preset of [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63839/?]ICBINE 3[/url], by my calculations it should be as demanding as that preset.
(I will make an even more performance friendly version anyways, so dont worry!)

[size=3][b][color=#00ffff]
FOR THOSE WHO DONT KNOW, ITS NOT ENB, ITS A SWEETFX PRESET, SO IF YOU CAN RUN AN ENB, THIS WILL TAKE LITERALLY 0 FPS, AND IF YOUR PC IS SUPER WEAK, IT WILL COST VERY FEW FPS :)[/color]
[/b][/size][color=#93c47d]
[font=Verdana][size=5][b]PLEASE GIVE ME SOME FEEDBACK SO I CAN MAKE IT AS NICE AS POSSIBLE![/b]
[/size][/font][/color][/center][color=#45818e]
[/color]
[center][/center]
author: ElSopa
